title: Tyson Fury taunts Braun Strowman after mass brawl at WWE Raw
text:
Fury and Strowman came to blows on Monday night (Picture: WWE)

Tyson Fury has called for another showdown with Braun Strowman after the pair sparked a brawl at WWE Raw on Monday night.

The Gypsy King had caused a stir by leaping over the barriers to confront Strowman last week and caused even more chaos on Raw when he was given an open mic.

Fury and Strowman had to be held back by several other wrestlers as things turned nasty and WWE star Cesaro was caught in the crosshairs when he was knocked out by the British heavyweight after the live broadcast had cut out.

Despite the most recent melee, Fury appears determined to settle his feud with Strowman and took to social media to send a message to his new arch enemy.

Take that…… let me know when u want more of these hands….. @BraunStrowman pic.twitter.com/ckiO2ideJd — TYSON FURY (@Tyson_Fury) October 8, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Take that…… let me know when u want more of these hands….. Braun Strowman,’ Fury said on Twitter.

‘Who wants to see me flatten this bum?’

Fury is currently on hiatus from his ring career after suffering a nasty cut during his win over Otto Wallin last month.

The former unified champion is booked to fight WBC champion Deontay Wilder in their rematch in February.
